Package io.goobi.viewer.model.viewer.pageloader

Class EagerPageLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.goobi.viewer.model.viewer.pageloader.AbstractPageLoader
      • io.goobi.viewer.model.viewer.pageloader.EagerPageLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPageLoader, Serializable
    public class EagerPageLoader
extends AbstractPageLoader
implements Serializable
    Old style page loading strategy (load all pages and keep them in memory).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
